description: Under certain conditions, SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (BI Workspace), versions 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, allows an attacker to access sensitive data such as directory structure, leading to Information Disclosure.

product.name: SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (BI Workspace)
